text: int main ( ) { int t ; long n , i ; long long int count , val ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; long long int a [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%lld" , & a [ i ] ) ; count = 1 ; val = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] <= a [ i + 1 ] ) count ++ ; else { val += count * ( count + 1 ) / 2 ; count = 1 ; } } val += count * ( count + 1 ) / 2 ; printf ( "%lld\n" , val ) ; } return 0 ; }
